---

**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]

###Details and Assumptions
* [document that you know]

###Acceptance criteria

 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
